Case# MPMovieFinishReason.userExited

iOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1Deprecated

```
case userExited
```

Deprecated

Use AVPlayerViewController in AVKit

## [Discussion](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMovieFinishReason/userExited#Discussion)

The user stopped playback.
